TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MemoryTranscriptStore extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Core.Extensions.ITranscriptLogger, class Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Core.Extensions.ITranscriptStore
type MemoryTranscriptStore = class interface ITranscriptStore interface ITranscriptLogger

Docs.summary: The memory transcript store stores transcripts in volatile memory in a Dictionary.
Docs.note: Because this uses an unbounded volitile dictionary this should only be used for unit tests or non-production environments
